snippet: These first days of March, with Jupiter and Venus in a rare moment of alignment, offer some of the best views of some of our neighboring planets.
abstract: Editorial reflects that the first days of March, with Jupiter and Venus in a rare moment of alignment, offer some of the best views of Earth's neighboring planets.
lead_paragraph: These first days of March, with Jupiter and Venus in a rare moment of alignment, offer some of the best views of some of our neighboring planets.
